archimate:BusinessObject.name: TerminationPointPool
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: "This object class represents a set of Termination Points or Group Termination Points that are grouped. Properties that are common for all the TPs/GTPs in the TPPool are identified in the multiple associated commonTransmissionParameters. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0014 and R_TMF518_NRF_I_0015."
